sets.tps: 192 HP, 52 En, 24 M Atk, 40 M Def, 192 R Def
sets.detail:
192 HP, 192 Ranged Defense, Very Clever, and Heavy Shield are to be as Ranged bulky as possible 
 192 HP with 40 Melee Defense makes Brawny Tyrecks Earthquake 4HKO 
 24 Melee Attack with Hasty makes Earthquake 2HKO 72 HP, 24 Melee Defense, Health Amulet Pharoglyph 
 52 Energy = 254 Energy at level 50 for (3 Earthquakes + 1 Rejuvenate) with Heavy Shield
sets.author: Epicly Epic Gamer
